title: Medical Emergency - Informal Language
prompt: Ugh, so my dog needs surgery and it's going to be expensive. The vet said $3700, let's plan for the higher end to be safe. I bring home about $3600 monthly and my regular bills are like $2800. I can probably get the surgery done next month if I have to, or wait a month if it helps financially. Currently sitting on $2000 in my checking account. This is for April 2024 start, looking at just 3 months to keep it simple.
